item.title: Meatball Manufacturing
item.description:
Meatball Manufacturing

Our client was looking for optimization potential in the industrial manufacturing process of meatballs - famously known for meatball supplier at IKEA restaurants. Basically in the production process, meatball makes by very simple steps like. 1. Chop the meat into pieces 2. Ground piece of meat Each of the steps is fully automated like this in everywhere.

item.title: Hotel Check-in Services
item.description:
Hotel Check-in Services

In one of our internal practice, we were challenging the Check-In process in the hotel business for better customer experience. Regardless hotel service class, repeated customer, pre-booking customer and the walk-in customer will be sharing the same starting point of their service experience at your hotel by waiting for staff at hotel counter for checking in.

item.title: Water Saving Sanitary Ware
item.description:
Water Saving Sanitary Ware

Villeroy & Boch was aiming to reduce the water consumption in toilets and hereby create a new toilet concept that offers customers around the world more value than the traditional design. Usually, a standard toilet uses water up to 6 liters per flush. With average 5... #multiplication #ourworks
